titleStmt.title: The ansvver of the Commissioners of the kingdome of Scotland, to both Houses of Parliament, upon the new propositions of peace, and the foure bills to be sent to his Majestie.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, dwelling at the sign of the Kings head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: B1r has two side-notes. Variant: with one side-note.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
